title: Library of elements for surveys of PD workshops

elements.name: consent_survey
elements.title: Your participation is voluntary but strongly encouraged. Do you consent to completing this survey?

elements.name: survey_preamble_header_and_text
elements.html:
{workshop_course} Academic Year Workshop Post-Survey

Congratulations! You've completed a Code.org {workshop_course} Academic Year Workshop!

This survey asks questions about your experience today. 

Privacy and Confidentiality

  • Your individual responses here are completely confidential.
  • Your identity will never be revealed publicly or used to tie any responses back to you personally.
  • We may share de-identified, aggregate data (representing all responses) publicly.
  • Your de-identified responses will be used by Code.org, our Regional Partners, and our facilitators for program improvement.

This survey should take less than 10 minutes to complete.  Your complete honesty and candor are appreciated.

elements.name: overall_success
elements.title: How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements about the workshop overall?

rows.text: I feel more prepared to teach the material covered in this workshop than before I came.
I know where to go if I need help preparing to teach this material.
This professional development was suitable for my level of experience with teaching CS.
I feel connected to a community of computer science teachers.
I would recommend this professional development to others.
This was the absolute best professional development I have ever participated in.

elements.name: teacher_engagement
elements.title: How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements about your level of engagement in the workshop?

rows.text: I found the activities we did in this workshop interesting and engaging.
I was highly active and participated a lot in the workshop activities.
When I'm not in Code.org workshops, I frequently talk about ideas or content from the workshop with others.
I am definitely planning to make use of ideas and content covered in this workshop in my classroom.

elements.name: feel_prepared
elements.title: I feel more prepared to teach {workshop_course} than I did at the beginning of the day.

elements.name: teacher_comfort
elements.title: I feel comfortable collaborating with teachers in my cohort and asking for support.

elements.name: teacher_community
elements.title: I feel like I am connected to a community of teachers in my {workshop_course} workshop.

elements.name: excited_about_tomorrow
elements.title: I am excited about what we will do next time in this workshop.

elements.name: what_supported
elements.title: What supported your learning the most today and why?

elements.name: what_detracted
elements.title: What detracted from your learning today and why?

elements.name: discuss_tomorrow
elements.title: What is one thing you hope to discuss or learn more about the next time we meet?

elements.name: question2
elements.html:
Facilitator Feedback

Please be thoughtful in your responses for each individual.

templateElements.name: facilitator_feedback_FR
templateElements.title: Do you have any feedback about today for {panel.facilitator_name}?

elements.name: question1
elements.html: Thank you for the feedback and for participating today!
